sources.name: source1
sources.script:
source(output(
		PersonID as integer,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		Address as string,
		City as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select * from persons',
	format: 'query') ~> source1

transformations.name: Select1
transformations.script:
source1 select(mapColumn(
		PersonID,
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		Address,
		City
	))~> Select1
